mapper.sql: id, send_id, user_id, title, content, status, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select message.id,title,content,create_time as createTime,um.id as userMessageId from message join user_message as um on message.id=um.message_id where FIND_IN_SET(um.id,#{idStr})

select message.id,title,content,message.create_time as createTime,um.id as userMessageId,um.status,si.name from message join user_message as um on message.id=um.message_id join sys_user_info si on si.id=um.user_id where FIND_IN_SET(um.id,#{idStr})
